item.title: SIMSIM FAMILY KEBAB COMBO $49
item.dc:creator: simsim
item.description: Two Skewers of Chicken Shish Tawook and Two Skewers of Beef & Lamb Kebab. Served with our Signature Hummus, Fattoush Salad and Basmati Arabic Rice. Serves 4.
item.content:encoded: Two Skewers of Chicken Shish Tawook and Two Skewers of Beef & Lamb Kebab. Served with our Signature Hummus, Fattoush Salad and Basmati Arabic Rice. Serves 4.

item.title: BEEF & LAMB KEBAB $16
item.dc:creator: simsim
item.description: Seasoned Ground Beef & Lamb that is Skewered and Served with our Signature Hummus, Fattoush Salad and Basmati Arabic Rice. Served with Tahini & Tomato Sauces.
item.content:encoded: Seasoned Ground Beef & Lamb that is Skewered and Served with our Signature Hummus, Fattoush Salad and Basmati Arabic Rice. Served with Tahini & Tomato Sauces.

item.title: CHICKEN SHISH TAWOOK $13
item.dc:creator: simsim
item.description: Charbroiled Chicken Tenders Skewered and Served with our Signature Hummus, Fattoush Salad and Basmati Arabic Rice. Served with Cucumber Yogurt & Garlic Sauces.
item.content:encoded: Charbroiled Chicken Tenders Skewered and Served with our Signature Hummus, Fattoush Salad and Basmati Arabic Rice. Served with Cucumber Yogurt & Garlic Sauces.
